articles.title: Nintendo Shares Plunge 10% After Weak Profit Spurs Margin Fears - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Nintendo Co.’s shares slid their most in 18 months after the company reported disappointing earnings, revealing a big hit to margins while concerns grow about the impact of soaring memory chip prices in 2026.

articles.title: Rumor: Voice actor page leaks Xenoblade game for 2026 - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: A new voice actor leak has allegedly outed a Xenoblade game for 2026, and it could be the return of Xenoblade Chronicles 2.

articles.title: TikToker Complains Air India Lounge Smells Like Indian Food, Gets Roasted - One Mile at a Time
articles.description: The internet has a lot of opinions after a TikToker complained that the Air India Lounge in New York smells like... Indian food.

articles.description: AMD says it’s ready to support Microsoft launching its next-gen Xbox in 2027. The pair have partnered to work on a custom chip for the next Xbox.

articles.title: Take-Two CEO Responds to Stock Price Drop Following Google Genie Announcement: 'I Think People Are Confusing Tools With Hits' - IGN
articles.description: Last week, Google announced Project Genie, an AI-powered virtual world creator still in its infancy that seemed to spook a number of video game investors. But at least one video game CEO isn't ruffled: Take-Two's Strauss Zelnick.

articles.description: There are countless TV deals at any given moment, but if you’re serious about quality, these 4K TV deals stand out from the rest for the Super Bowl.

articles.description: Rockstar's highly anticipated open-world action game remains on schedule.

articles.title: 'Borderlands 4' Switch 2 Release Scrapped; Take Two on 'GTA Online' Charlie Kirk Mission - Variety
articles.description: Take-Two Interactive revealed it is pausing development on its Nintendo Switch 2 edition of "Borderlands 4" in its latest quarterly earnings.
